metadata.source: Energy agencies, scientific literature, manufacturer specifications
metadata.description: Energy consumption across diverse activities, devices, and scales

data.name: LED Bulb (1 hour)
data.description: 10W LED bulb running for one hour

data.name: Smartphone Charge (full)
data.description: Charging smartphone battery from 0-100% (~15 Wh)

data.name: Laptop (1 hour)
data.description: Average laptop power consumption for one hour (~50W)

data.name: Tablet Charge (full)
data.description: Charging tablet battery from 0-100% (~40 Wh)

data.name: Desktop Computer (1 hour)
data.description: Desktop PC with monitor, typical usage (~200W)

data.name: LED TV 55-inch (1 hour)
data.description: Modern 55-inch LED TV running for one hour (~100W)

data.name: Gaming Console (1 hour)
data.description: PlayStation 5 or Xbox Series X during gameplay (~150W)

data.name: Electric Kettle (boiling 1 liter)
data.description: Boiling one liter of water from room temperature

data.name: Microwave Oven (15 minutes)
data.description: Microwave at full power for 15 minutes (~1000W)

data.name: Hair Dryer (10 minutes)
data.description: Typical hair dryer for 10 minutes (~1500W)

data.name: Washing Machine (one load)
data.description: Complete wash cycle with warm water

data.name: Dishwasher (one cycle)
data.description: Full dishwasher cycle including drying

data.name: Electric Oven (1 hour)
data.description: Electric oven at 180°C for one hour (~2500W)

data.name: Clothes Dryer (one load)
data.description: Electric tumble dryer, full cycle

data.name: Hot Shower (10 minutes)
data.description: Electric water heater for 10-minute shower (~30 kW)

data.name: Refrigerator (per day)
data.description: Modern energy-efficient refrigerator daily consumption

data.name: Air Conditioner (1 hour)
data.description: Residential AC unit running for one hour (~1500W)

data.name: Electric Space Heater (1 hour)
data.description: Portable electric heater on full power (~1500W)

data.description: Average daily household electricity consumption in EU

data.description: Average monthly household electricity in EU

data.description: Average annual household electricity in EU

data.description: Average annual household electricity in US

data.description: Energy consumed per Bitcoin transaction (highly variable)

data.description: Energy per Ethereum transaction after proof-of-stake

data.name: Google Search
data.description: Estimated energy per Google search query (~0.3 Wh)

data.name: Email (typical)
data.description: Energy to send/receive typical email with small attachment

data.name: Netflix Streaming (1 hour, HD)
data.description: Streaming HD video for one hour, including data center and network

data.name: Video Call (1 hour)
data.description: One hour of video conferencing (Zoom, Teams)

data.description: Typical rack server daily energy consumption (~5 kW)

data.name: EV Charge (Tesla Model 3, full)
data.description: Charging Tesla Model 3 Long Range from empty to full

data.name: EV Drive (100 km)
data.description: Electric vehicle driving 100 km at ~15 kWh/100km efficiency

data.name: Gasoline Car (100 km energy equivalent)
data.description: Energy content of gasoline for 100 km drive (~6L × 10 kWh/L)

data.name: Train Journey (100 km per passenger)
data.description: Electric train per passenger for 100 km

data.name: Bus Journey (100 km per passenger)
data.description: City bus per passenger for 100 km

data.name: Flight (short-haul, per passenger)
data.description: Energy equivalent for ~500 km flight per passenger

data.name: Flight (long-haul, per passenger)
data.description: Energy equivalent for ~10,000 km flight per passenger

data.name: Manufacturing (1 kg steel)
data.description: Energy to produce 1 kg of steel from ore

data.description: Energy to produce 1 kg of aluminum from bauxite

data.description: Energy to recycle 1 kg of aluminum (95% less than primary)

data.description: Energy to produce 1 kg of plastic from petroleum

data.description: Energy to produce 1 kg of cement

data.description: Energy to produce 1 kg of glass

data.description: Municipal wastewater treatment per cubic meter

data.description: Large aluminum smelter daily consumption (~10 MW)

data.description: Medium-sized hospital daily electricity consumption

data.description: Large supermarket daily electricity use

data.description: Medium commercial office building daily consumption

data.description: Small data center daily consumption (~2 MW)

data.description: Large data center daily consumption (~50 MW)

data.name: City (1 million people, per day)
data.description: Total electricity for city of 1 million (~35 kWh/person/day)

data.name: Bitcoin Network (per day)
data.description: Total daily energy consumption of Bitcoin mining globally

data.description: Large stadium during major event including lighting and systems

data.description: Large cruise ship daily energy consumption (~15 MW)

data.description: Large container ship daily fuel energy equivalent (~25 MW)

data.name: Nuclear Power Plant (per day output)
data.description: 1 GW nuclear plant daily electricity generation (24 GWh)

data.name: Wind Farm (100 turbines, per day)
data.description: 100× 3 MW turbines at 30% capacity factor (~300 MWh)

data.name: Solar Farm (100 MW, per day)
data.description: 100 MW solar farm daily output (~4 hours effective sun)

data.name: Pumped Hydro Storage (cycle loss)
data.description: Energy loss in one charge-discharge cycle of 10 MWh storage (~25% loss)

data.name: Rocket Launch (energy equivalent)
data.description: Energy equivalent of fuel for heavy-lift rocket launch

data.description: Norway daily electricity consumption (~150 TWh/year)

data.description: Germany daily electricity consumption (~500 TWh/year)
